description: 'Farrington Park' park side wonderful townhomes, built by Polygon, are in the foothills neighborhood on the prestigious Burke Mountain. This gorgeous 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home features a flexible open concept layout with light modern laminate flooring, stainless Steel appliances, gourmet kitchen featuring engineered stone counter tops 7 flat panel cabinetry. new Hot water tank(2022), washer and dryer(2023), dishes washer(2024) and brand new stove. Farrington Park is great for families, next to Galloway Park with a playground, splash pad & sports court. walking distances to Smiling Creek elementary school, and new Secondary school(under construction), clinic and Shoppers, CEFA daycare. minutes to Coquitlam Centre, skytrain, T&T, Costco and community centre. Move in ready, must SEE!
